Detailed Description

Implements hardware occlusion queries on the GPU.

bool OcclusionQuery::isPotentialOccluder ( Ogre::SceneNode *  node  ) 

Checks if the objects held by this scenenode can be considered as potential occluders (which might not be the case when transparency is involved)
